name: Copy Operation File
summary: A COPF file is a copy operation file used by Copy Files Into Multiple Folders, a batch file copying application developed by Vovsoft. It contains a plain text list of files to be copied and a list of folders the files will be copied to. COPF files are created by selecting File â†’ Save Operation File... in Copy Files Into Multiple Folders' menu bar.
